extendedInfo.description: A soothing live wallpaper that slowly cycles from twilight to dawn. I've gotten a number of requests for a version of Nightfall that also includes daytime. It can be a little tricky to get the colors to flow nicely from one to the next, but I think it came out great. The moonlit side in particular has a beautiful stillness that is hard to describe.Supports all screen sizes.Get the full version here! https://market.android.com/details?id=com.driftwood.wallpaper.daybreakArt by Anne PÃ¤tzke.

reviews.title: Best live wallpaper ever
reviews.comment: I just love the simplicity of this And it has great graphics... keep up the amazing work!!
reviews.author: Kelley Denton

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Full of intrusive ads. Not the way to do business. A program like this will make your device slower.
reviews.author: Mitch Morrison

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is beautiful and soothing..you did a wonderful job. Are there icons to go with it? I love alll your themes,.better by far than any I\'ve seen.
reviews.author: Cheri Overacker

reviews.title: ITs. Erh
reviews.comment: Is very tempting kickback listen to it and calm down but I\'m hungover but for waiting for thank you

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: good live wallpaper

reviews.comment: It looks pretty
reviews.author: Anurag Sengupta

reviews.comment: Top ranking
reviews.author: muralidhar joshi

reviews.title: Lol
reviews.comment: Worked fine before the update, but didn\'t fit the screen. Now that it fits the screen, the windmill isn\'t attached to the base and its jerky. Scrolling looks really really terrible. Probably one of the best looking live wallpapers.... if you don\'t use your phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing,
reviews.comment: A+. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It was good
reviews.comment: Before the update no additional permissions was required and works fine. Now, request full network permission (for what?) and is too slow (and lagging) when sliding the screen on SG2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No panning?
reviews.comment: I had bought the full version, but refund it after i realized the wallpaper not panning when i swipe the screen. It looked so weird when the windmill got cut off...  I gave 4 stars since i really like the it overall. Maybe better with a bit more choice of settings on the full version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great lwp. But it keeps crashing after update please fix :) EDIT: It\'s working but its laggy when scrolling...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: It is beautiful and enjoy having it on my screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying Advertisements
reviews.comment: Was not excited about the ads on some of your wallpapers, but discovered I could choose not to see them. This is acceptable.  Really pretty wallpapers, by the way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Needs more foregrounds. I bought the full! Hope more foregrounds will be added..?!
